The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at 45 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . The Hawks also out - rebounded the Magic 42 - 40 . Paul Millsap was the high - point man for the Hawks , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and three assists . Al Horford chipped in with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and four assists , in 31 minutes . DeMarre Carroll had a strong showing as well , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and three steals . He 's now pushed his season averages to 18 points and 8 rebounds per game . The Hawks had all five starters reach double figures in points . Nikola Vucevic led the way , recording a double - double with 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 15 rebounds . Nikola Vucevic was the only other player to score in double figures , as he finished with 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 15 rebounds and three assists . He 's now pushed his season averages to 12 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo also had a strong showing , finishing with 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . The Magic 's next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers went 45 percent from the floor and 29 percent from deep . The 76ers also out - rebounded the 76ers 45 - 42 , giving them the advantage in the victory . The San Antonio Spurs ( 56 - 16 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 27 - 46 ) 106 - 98 on Tuesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 33 - 23 in the first quarter alone . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 47 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from deep . The Spurs shot 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 47 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from deep . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Knicks 50 - 45 , which may have been the difference in this one . Kawhi Leonard led all scorers , going 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five assists and two blocked shots . LaMarcus Aldridge had a double - double of his own , finishing with 19 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds . Pau Gasol had a strong showing , going 8 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while adding 10 rebounds and two blocked shots in 26 minutes . It was a big night for the Spurs , as he 's only reached the 20 - point plateau in four of his last five games . For the Knicks , it was a big night for the rest of the starters . Willy Hernangomez and Derrick Rose both reached double figures in points as well . Hernangomez finished with 24 points ( 11 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and 13 rebounds , while Derrick Rose added 24 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and five assists . The only other Knick in double figures was Mindaugas Kuzminskas , who finished with 19 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and two assists . Kristaps Porzingis had a strong showing as well , finishing with 12 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Tuesday .

The Hawks shot 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The Magic had six players score in double figures , but it was n't enough to keep them in the game . The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Portland Trail Blazers , 110 - 103 , at Moda Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) came into this game as one of the best defenses in the NBA , but the Raptors ( 24 - 16 ) were able to hold off the Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) . Kyle Lowry led all scorers with 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , including 7 - of - 10 from long range , to go along with eight assists , six rebounds , two blocks and two steals , in 40 minutes . DeMar DeRozan followed up with 29 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting , along with five rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in 14 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks , in 25 minutes . Terrence Ross chipped in 12 points , three rebounds and one assist , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Raptors shot 47 percent from the field and 63 percent from three - point range . Damian Lillard led the way with 27 points and 11 assists . C. J. McCollum added 21 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Allen Crabbe followed up with 17 points , three rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 34 minutes off the bench . Gerald Henderson added 10 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Trail Blazers will look to bounce back when they visit the Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 26 ) on Monday .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 6 - 18 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 13 - 13 ) 97 - 79 on Friday . Philadelphia has won two of their last three games . Jahlil Okafor was the only other starter to score in double figures , finishing with 14 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting and nine rebounds in 27 minutes . T. J. McConnell contributed 12 points , 10 rebounds , and nine assists in 37 minutes . The Sixers will look to extend their win streak to three games on Monday when they host the Nets . Detroit , meanwhile , saw strong play from its stars . Marcus Morris scored a game - high 28 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , including 4 - of - 7 from three - point range . Andre Drummond added 14 points , 14 rebounds and six steals . The Pistons shot just 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from beyond the arc .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 108 - 90 , at Phillips Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 26 - 32 ) came into this game as one of the best defenses in the league , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of this game . The Heat ( 26 - 32 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the stretch . Tyler Johnson led the way in scoring , putting up 23 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting , five rebounds and five assists in 26 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic added 17 points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Dion Waiters chipped in 14 points on 6 - of - 19 shooting , and 10 assists , in 31 minutes . Willie Reed added 12 points and 10 rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot just 40 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . The Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Tim Hardaway Jr. followed up with 11 points , two rebounds and one block , in 25 minutes . Kent Bazemore chipped in 10 points , three rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 23 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits was Kent Bazemore , who finished with 10 points .
The Denver Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) 129 - 101 on Sunday . The Nuggets came into this game as one of the worst defenses in the NBA , but they were able to prevail with a huge win . In fact , Denver shot 54 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Denver winning that battle , 42 - 46 . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Will Barton was the player of the game , as he tallied 22 points and six assists off the bench . Nikola Jokic recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points and 10 rebounds . Jamal Murray led the bench in scoring , dropping 22 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting off the bench . On deck for Denver is a home matchup against the Utah Jazz on Friday . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the standings . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) came into this game as one of the best defenses in the NBA , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 40 - plus minutes .
